API¶

Import perturbseq as:

import perturbseq as perturb

Read in data: io¶

Read in guides.

io.read_perturbations_csv(data, …)

Read in which perturbations were present in which cell.

Preprocessing: pp¶

perturbseq.pp.annotate_controls(adata_here)

perturbseq.pp.remove_guides_from_gene_names(…)

perturbseq.pp.perturbations_per_cell(adata_here)

perturbseq.pp.perturbations_per_cell(adata_here)

perturbseq.pp.subsample_cells(adata, …)

perturbseq.pp.cells_per_perturbation(adata_here)

Counts the number of cells for each perturbation.

perturbseq.pp.perturb2obs(adata_here[, …])

perturbseq.pp.moi(adata_here[, pref, level, …])
